text: Beyond the Forest is a 1949 American crime drama movie directed by King Vidor and was based on the novel of the same name by Stuart Engstrand. It stars Bette Davis, Joseph Cotten, David Brian, Ruth Roman, Minor Watson, Regis Toomey and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1950. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by King Vidor Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Beyond the Forest
